alert.note: Alert for Cooper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued March 02 at 9:50AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Hydrologic Outlook for the following rivers... Lamine River near Otterville This hydrologic outlook is based on the forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours and estimated runoff from earlier rainfall. Crests may vary if actual rainfall or runoff is greater or less than anticipated. Location: Lamine River near Otterville Flood stage: 15.0 feet Latest stage: 2.5 feet at 9 AM Thursday Maximum Forecast Stage: 17.9 feet at 6 PM Friday Mar 03 Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat 12pm 12pm 12pm Lamine River Otterville 15.0 2.5 Thu 9am 2.5 14.3 7.3 Later statements, possibly warnings, may be issued as additional information becomes available.
